oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Major General Lovell Rousseau
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite studio portrait of Union Major General Lovell H. Rousseau in uniform. Picture is on unmarked p. 3, upper left, in album.

Union major general Rousseau was in command of Union troops during the Third Battle of Murfreesboro (December 5-7, 1864) in the Nashville-Franklin Campaign. He served gallantly in the Battles of Shiloh, Stones River, and Chickamauga,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carte de visite; Rousseau, Lovell Harrison, 1818-1869; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Portraits; United States. Army--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
Photographs: Generals; Uniforms
